title: DEMOTION due to afkers/leavers OCE
body:
i would like to ask why i got demoted although so many games in ranked people or myself ever played there would always have an afker etc etc etc.

then u lose LP and demotion due to that player do you riot people ever take into account on how rank works if there is a unfair game 4v5. afkers.

people are losing alot cause you guys dont do shit about it especially the OCE server.

replies.body:
I find that I have AFKers like... once every hundred games. This is anecdotal evidence, although I suppose yours is too. However, they have done things about this.
Like low-priority queue.
All I have seen of you is you complaining about Riot being crap though, then swearing at someone. In addition, people are more likely to be toxic or leave if other people are being toxic. I haven't played with you, of course, but if you are encountering this thing a lot it may be a reflection on you as well.
Anyway though, if you lose the occasional game because of an AFKer, that isn't going to have a large impact on your ranking anyway. You would have gotten demoted because a greater number of your games are losses.  Sucks if some of those losses are due to AFKers, but you can't just blame your fall on the ranks on the fact that some people AFK.
I win 4v5s a lot though.
Don't give up on them, and don't give me any lip like "Can't carry a team as support doe", because I have carried 4v5s as support Leona... and support Karma... although that second one makes more sense. It isn't a case of taking kills and trying to snowball, but doing your best to work with your team to get picks, close gold gaps, create a gold gap in your favour and other things. A 4v5 doesn't matter if your four people have the tactics and the gold to eliminate the enemies from the game.

Nobody needed you to show off about the fact you can "carry" as support because nobody cares. AFK and even DC's are very annoying and they can be the downfall of a rank. It might not be there fault if they DC but it is extremely frustrating and I can't emphasize how frustrating they are. Not to mention the AFK's who can't suck up that they are gonna have the allocated teammates that they will play with for 40-45 minutes or less and probably never play with them again. Also please explain how it is fair for people who have a major disadvantage of the loss of one player, to come to defeat and lose lp. I had someone afk because I didn't want him to gank me. Riot can also do things about afks and dc's not punishment wise cause that's been covered but LP wise.

the term *carrying* relies heavily on some level of competence from the rest of your team.
In many cases, a lot of people *%%%%* around in ranked, throw the game - no matter how far ahead you may be, it's not something skill alone can accomplish when you consider the inconsistencies in the assumption made. I'll give you an example : You might be able to carry as a support leona, but that relies heavily on the assumption that your ADC knows how stick to enemies. What I'm trying to say is, there are a fair number of people who play ADC but don't stick to enemies (walk away) when they are literally in 0 danger. As a result, they let the team down and something goes wrong as a result.The same can be said for mid-laners or any of the other participants in your team - they need to be consistent in order for you to win the game. Having said that, I can understand OP's frustration, but I don't think it's reasonable to trash talk riot for not doing anything about it.
I reckon Nobody should lose or win LP if there is an afk in a game. Just only IP. Sort of makes sense.
